page.title: 07PLANTS AND ANIMALS
page.content: Some {plants} are wild. We can find nettles, daisies, dandelions, grass, wild flowers and hedges. Some {trees} are wild. We often think wild plants are weeds so we kill them. Wildlife grows in our back gardens, front gardens, along the sides of roads and fields, by trees, by rivers, fences, gateways and beside walls. We also find moss growing on roofs. We have indoor plants like the cactus and rubber plants. Our outdoor plants are sunflowers, dafodils, poppys, sweet williams and snap dragons. {Pets and wild animals} At home we have; 1 hamster, 3 rabbit, 4 cats, 10 dogs, 2 ducks, 12 fish, 14 birds, 5 snails and 9 frogs. We have some wild pheasants, foxes, rabbits and hares. Written by Rachel Kaye
